title: Johan : 在IOS上发布PE0.10.4
author: REN0011
txt_content:

jbernhardsson
We just released 0.10.4 on iOS. Should be rolling out within the next few hours. :)

我们刚刚在IOS上发布了0.10.4.应该会在接下来的几个小时内推出。:)

This version fixes the reported crashes. :)
2/12/2014 7:39 pm
